summary: This module defines a unittest class that exercises MONAI's LearningRateFinder using a small MedNIST dataset and a DenseNet model. It sets up deterministic data loading, applies standard preprocessing transforms, runs the LR finder, and asserts that the returned learning rates and loss values meet expected criteria.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the learning rate finder utility to support reliable hyperparameter tuning in medical imaging deep learning workflows.
